Vision, Mission & Values

Our Vision

To be counted amongst Indiaâ€™s top engineering, procurement and construction companies in power transmission and distribution.

Our Mission

  • To achieve excellence in project execution, quality, safety, reliability, delivery and operational efficiency
  • To promote world class practices within the organization
  • To consistently achieve profitable growth
  • To offer a work culture that encourages learning, individual growth, team spirit and creativity, so as to overcome challenges
  • To uphold the guiding principles of trust, integrity and transparency in all our interactions and dealings
  • To commit ourselves to the sustainable development of the Indian power sector through constant innovation
  • To be a responsible corporate citizen creating tangible value for stakeholders, employees and the society

Our Values

Safety

Our success depends on the well being of all people as well as equipments involved in the completion of our projects. At MAEIPL, every task is designed so as to ensure safety of the highest order and protect everyone from accidents of any nature and degree during execution, operation and maintenance of works.

Quality

Quality is an expression of our goal to offer reliable and world-class solutions for the all round satisfaction of our customers. Over the years, MAEIPL has built a strong reputation in the industry to have stamped every project with its trademark quality. Time and again, our work has been acclaimed for quality at all levels by state utilities as well as private clientele.

Commitment

Commitment refers to our spirit of determination and unwavering dedication to offer great service to our clients, as well as other initiatives that impact lives both within and outside the organization. We take all our professional commitments personally, and assume full responsibility for our actions.

About MAEIPL

Maha Active Engineers India Pvt. Ltd., a provider of reliable and world class infrastructure in transmission and distribution of power has entered its third decade of operations and is poised to make rapid strides in the upcoming years. We are dynamic and progressive, committed to providing the entire range of EPC services covering design, engineering, supply, erection, testing and commissioning
